subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for the ValidationGroup UI component.

subMembers.name: brokenRules
subMembers.type: Array<RequiredRule, NumericRule, RangeRule, StringLengthRule, CustomRule, CompareRule, PatternRule, EmailRule, AsyncRule>
subMembers.description: An array of the [validation rules] that failed.

subMembers.name: complete
subMembers.description: A promise that is fulfilled when all async rules are validated.

subMembers.name: isValid
subMembers.description: Indicates whether all the rules checked for the group are satisfied.

subMembers.name: validators
subMembers.description: [Validator] UI components included in the validated group.

properties.name: dxValidationGroup
properties.description: The ValidationGroup is a UI component that allows you to validate several editors simultaneously.

Methods.name: reset()
Methods.description: Resets the value and validation result of the editors that are included to the current validation group.

Methods.name: validate()
Methods.description: Validates rules of the [validators] that belong to the current validation group.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.
